channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- U.motion Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- U.motion Builder

item.title: CVE-2018-7785|2024-09-16T18:08:37.585Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion%20builder
item.description: In Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4, a remote command injection allows authentication bypass.

item.title: CVE-2018-7784|2024-09-16T19:35:35.515Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion%20builder
item.description: In Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4, this exploit occurs when the submitted data of an input string is evaluated as a command by the application. In this way, the attacker could execute code, read the stack, or cause a segmentation fault in the running application.
